summary: Revealing male version of the Dragonscale Armor. Sets for Sundracon\'s and MysticBinary\'s Male Body Mods available.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Revealing Dragonscale Armor[/u][/b]

Textures and meshes for a more revealing variant of the Dragonscale Armor.

Versions for MysticBinary\'s and Sundracon\'s Male Body Mods are available.


[u]Requirements[/u]

[url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=265]BodyHair Nude Male HD[/url] by MysticBinary

or

[url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3421]Nude Male with Import from Roberts New Vegas Male[/url] by Sundracon

[i]You need the \'Base Textures\' set and [b]only one[/b] of the Mesh Sets - depending on which Male Body Mod above you are using.[/i]


[u]Installation[/u]
 
 - Download and extract the \'Base Textures\' set to the Data/ directory

 - Download and extract [b]one[/b] of the mesh sets to the Data/ directory


[u]Uninstallation[/u]

 - Delete the files from the Data/ directory


[u]Credits[/u]

[i]Sundracon Set[/i]:
AlienSlof - Meshes
Sundracon - Conversion

[i]MysticBinary Set[/i]:
MysticBinary82 - Meshes

Bethesda - Textures
aoki - Fixes
author: Lugburzum

files.name: Base Textures
files.changelogHtml:
Split into separate files
Added support for Sundracon\'s mod
Added support for MysticBinary\'s mod
Updated to MysticBinary Mesh Set to use v1.5
